Sentencas: The mechanical properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) crystal under extreme conditions are theoretically investigated using the analytic free energy formulas derived from the statistical moment method.
Titulo: Application of statistical moment method to investigate mechanical properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: We calculate the elastic moduli and constants under temperature up to 2100 K and pressure up to 20 GPa using Buckingham potential.
Titulo: Application of statistical moment method to investigate mechanical properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The dopant concentration, temperature, and pressure dependences of the elastic moduli and constants of YSZ crystal are studied taking into account the anharmonic effects of the lattice vibrations.
Titulo: Application of statistical moment method to investigate mechanical properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Our results are in reasonable agreement with previous experiments and simulations.
Titulo: Application of statistical moment method to investigate mechanical properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: This approach can then be developed extensively to investigate the thermodynamic and mechanical properties of the other ceramic materials used in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Application of statistical moment method to investigate mechanical properties of yttria-stabilized zirconia
